## decodeRGBM() function

Decodes color value that was encoded into RGBM format

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function decodeRGBM(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, rgbm: PBShaderExp, maxRange: PBShaderExp | number): PBShaderExp;
```

The max range of color components


</td></tr>

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)
